original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā antaraghare nisīdanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū hattham pi pādam pi kīḷāpentāḥ antaraghare nisīdanti pe
antaraghare nisīdissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā kīḷāpento antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca hattham vā pādam vā kīḷāpentaḥ antaraghare nisīdati āpatti dukkaṭassa
